reviewText: Great story on both movies.  Must buy.  Delivered on time.

I bought this 2 pack. Only Tres Metros Sobre El Cielo has the English Subtitles. Tengo Ganas De Ti did not. I was very disappointed as the description says subtitles in English. I know that Tengo was playing on Netflix for a while, and there were English subtitles on that. i would have given this 5 stars if it had English subtitles for Tengo. Note that you HAVE to have a multi-zone DVD player to play these movies in the US. If this ever comes out with English Subtitles for Tengo Ganas De Ti, I will happily buy it again!
no sirven para usar en usa
